column17:
Dress gracefully to any occasion in this pretty saree in green colour. The saree looks further graceful with its silver embellished border that is intricately designed with silver thread. The detailing in paisley and vine design on the border enhances its look all the more.

Wash & Care
Wash it with a mild detergent.
Do not bleach or dry clean.
Wash with like colours.
Line dry.
Warm iron
